DOC.detailed_description: The severity dysmenorrhea pain experienced subject evaluate VAS , range zero ( pain ) ten ( severe pain ) . Subjects ask use VAS score system record , provide sheet , experience menstrual pain level daily menstrual bleeding total three consecutive menstrual cycle .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females age 40 year old . 2 . Screened inquiry diagnose primary dysmenorrhea gynaecologist pelvic ultrasonography . 3 . Female subject : use adequate contraception since last menstruation plan conception study . nonlactating . negative pregnancy test ( urine ) within 14 day prior study . 4 . Informed consent form sign . 1 . Sensitivity study product . 2 . Patient diagnose secondary dysmenorrhea ( define identifiable pelvic pathology ) . 3 . Patient clinically significant physical disability abnormal finding physical examination laboratory test judge investigator coinvestigator . 4 . Participation clinical investigation last 30 day .
